website_summaries.verdict: Make your own bottled hot sauces from kit that includes all the ingredients.
pros: Great fun if you're a DIYer
Follow the instructions and you'll be a pro at making hot sauces
Buy it for yourself or for friends or family who can't get enough hot sauce
cons: Not enough juniper berries for recipes

customer_reviews.title: Better than the rest of the hot sauce kits on Amazon for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! I bought it as a gift for Fathers day since my dad enjoys spicy food as well as cooking in general! I would highly suggest this particular product after researching other type products on Amazon and other websites. This kit had everything we needed and more! It was very well packed. When we opened the product it had everything as described and a nice personal note inside! It was fun, thoughtful, exciting, creative, and interesting all wrapped inside of one box! Once again, after reading the reviews from other customers, I figured this was the most promising and complete box out there. My expectations were exceeded.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Dad!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday present for dad. He was super excited when he opened it, and got to work right away. The entire house now stinks of spicy, and a second recipe is already underway. My dad doesn't care, but two of the pre-made sticker labels are for the sauce that can only be made once. I wish there were more, blank-er labels to write more info in. This kit is not all-inclusive, and you may have to buy more ingredients, but it is super fun and worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Awesome kit! So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is awesome! We had a “hot sauce making” party and used this kit (along with other peppers Home grown and store bought) and had a blast! Also purchased additional bottles so everyone could take some sauce home. Definitely a great gift to give for your hot sauce fan in your life!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Goooooood flavored sauces. Easy to use and follow the follow the directions. It does not include ALL the ingredients at it says. The missing items are not a big deal, but the packaging is misleading. The recipe makes more than the 2 bottles can hold, so you'll need another container. Again, not a big deal. But I would suggest having a third vessel ready for the finished product. The directions are good, but not great. Make sure the user has some minor cooking skills because the directions do leave a little to be desired. This is a cute gift and I would recommend it for someone.
customer_reviews.author: serena eber

customer_reviews.title: As Father's Day Gift Go - This is Waaaaaaay Batter Than A Tie!
customer_reviews.text: My kids got this for me for Fathers Day a year ago, but then never wanted to do it with me! Finally made time for it during "quarantine" and it made a great 1st 2 types of hot sauce! Very easy to make - all the ingredients are included along with simple, easy to follow instructions plus bottles for storing. We had a lot of fun whipping these up and then eating them. I am so glad I was gifted this as I would totally not buy this for myself and just buy a bottle of Tabasco Sauce. But it was fun & I enjoyed time with the kids. A great gift idea! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HathiTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Well-packaged with great ingredients, but limited in variety.
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift at Christmas, and I had a great time making my own hot sauce. At first, I followed the packaged recipes, but I plan on making my own to taste soon. The ingredients were well kept and smelled fresh, despite being dried. The sauces, of course, taste great, and I think this would be a great activity for a parent-child. The only reason this isn't 5 stars is because I thought the recipes that came along were few and some required multiple ingredients that didn't come with the kit. So, really, I could only make two of the recipes, and while delicious, I would have enjoyed greater variety or more ingredients within.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Tan

customer_reviews.title: Great idea- poorly executed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea- poorly executed. To start with- you’re not given all the ingredients to make the 3 sauces listed... secondly- you’re given enough vinegar to make 1.5 bottles (based on the instructions). We followed the directions to the letter- and then we had enough sauce for one glass bottle and 2 squeeze bottles. It makes zero sense the thought process. Your better off just buying glass bottles and taking recipes off the web. I was really looking forward to this kit.

product_meta.title: Hot Sauce Kit (Makes 7 Lip Smacking Gourmet Bottles) Featuring Heirloom Peppers From 5th Generation Farmers, A Full Set Of Recipes, Storing Bottles & More!
feature_bullets: AUTHENTIC HOT SAUCE KIT: Makes 7 bottles of lip smacking gourmet hot sauce right from home. It contains, 3 Glass Woozy Bottles, 4 Squeeze Bottles, a 2-inch funnel, an Apple Cider Vinegar bottle, a zipped pouch of Spice Blend, 2 pairs of gloves, 5 pH strips. Also, 3 woozy reducers, 3 black caps, 4 squeeze bottle tops with red cap, Ancho Pasillas, Chipotle and Habanero Pepper bags – instruction card, an open/close pouch of Ghost Pepper & 7 label stickers.

BEST. GIFT. EVER: "I got this kit for my hubby for the holidays and he absolutely loved it! I am an attention to detail freak, and appreciate all the extra goodies included like the gloves, ph strips and bottling funnel. So far we made 3 of the recipes that came with the kit and the Smokin’ Sauce is our favorite… seriously better than anything we ever tried!" (5 Stars) Amanda

5th GENERATION PEPPER FARMERS: So what’s the secret sauce behind the secret sauce? Simple. The highest quality peppers grown from a small 5th generation local pepper farm in Boulder, Co. Including the “Top Secret” 100% pure ghost pepper booster packet!

FULLY COLORED, FULLY ILLUSTRATED RECIPE CARDS: Includes step by step printed recipe cards that have been tested multiple times (tough job huh?) to ensure the perfect hot sauce each and every time. Recipe card also includes pro tips and flavor enhancing guide.

MADE IN THE USA: By people who love making high quality products with high quality ingredients for high quality people. Ingredients include all natural, gmo free, heirloom peppers... did we mention the “Top Secret” 100% pure ghost pepper booster packet?
